'''Material Collector''' is a limited time [[Gadget]] obtained from the [[Core of the Apparatus]] Event. It is used to collect the necessary materials during the "Source Material Collection", "Elemental Charge", and "Core Activation" stages of the manufacturing process of [[Robotic Furnishings]].
